elements.label: Theremin
elements.description: Its tunes live on the ether alone; Are these the tones that angels sing?

elements.label: Organ
elements.description: More an apparatus than a tool. Brass pipes and polished copper, it contorts the air into sound.

elements.label: Brass
elements.description: For Valor, Victory of Funeral, its song carries echoes of battle.

elements.label: Drum
elements.description: The oldest instrument, the most familiar rhythms.

elements.label: Guitar
elements.description: Cradled on your lap, this instrument can be your perfect accompaniment

elements.label: Violin
elements.description: An instrument made for lilting tunes, to describe changing moods or changing seasons.

elements.label: Sitar
elements.description: Through these strings, give your audience a taste of your experiences, an understanding of your view.
